answers.*: Polygons have a natural winding order and the modeler only needs to set a single triangles winding order for the entire mesh to match that winding order.

answers.x: Typically defined clockwise(CW) or counterclockwise(CCW), it is the order in which vertices of a triangle are input to the vertex shader for the front face.
Their order is defined when looking at the front face of the triangle and enumerating the vertices.
